page.title: 08Law and Order Page 2
page.content:
Still living in Chapel House is Mr. Holmes who started police-work in 1932. His most unpleasant job was going to accidents where people had been injured or killed. Mr. Holmes retired in 1957.
In 1985 there is a police house near the village on the A 591 road. P.C.Cleghorn is the present policeman. He does cycling proficiency tests with the children of Bassenthwaite School. He takes us to the village green and we ride around making the correct signal taking care at junctions. He is helping us to prepare this Doomsday Project as he ejoys working with computers. He belongs to the main police station at Keswick, 7 miles away. He has a police car and a walki_talkie .
